title: Joystick on League
body: Hello. I have a Logitech Attack 3 joystick, and i really want to try a different way to play League. i want to use my mouse for moving and attacking, but i want to use the joystick for moving the camera and using abilities. is there any way i'd be able to do this? i looked around in the hotkey options and it wasn't accepting the new binds that i was trying to imput.

replies.body: Eeeeeeee yea I'm really not sure League is going to work very well by using a joystick as input. You're welcome to try configuring it as such, but I'd highly suggest testing it in custom or practice games as to not affect other players games. Currently, we don't officially have support for joysticks.
